text: The Python is a multirole ship manufactured by Faulcon DeLacy, produced from 2700 to the present. It is considered one of the most balanced ships in terms of firepower, maneuverability, and protection. The Python can carry up to 292 tons of cargo and is capable of serving as a heavily armed freighter or an explorer. It has a high mass lock factor of 17, making it effective for piracy and bounty hunting. However, its maneuverability is a weakness, especially against smaller, more agile ships.

The Python has a hull mass of 350 tons, armor rating of 468 with a hardness of 65, and shields of 294 MJ. It has a heat capacity of 300, fuel capacity of 32 tons, and a cargo capacity ranging from 82 to 294 tons. The ship's top speed is 234 m/s (default) or 267 m/s (upgraded), with a boost speed of 305 m/s (default) or 348 m/s (upgraded). Its unladen jump range is 8.23 ly (default) or 30.45 ly (upgraded).

The Python features 4 utility mounts, 2 medium hardpoints, and 3 large hardpoints. Its internal compartments include 1 Class 1, 1 Class 2, 2 Class 3, 1 Class 4, 2 Class 5, and 3 Class 6 compartments. The default loadout includes Pulse Lasers on the medium hardpoints and empty large hardpoints.
